column1: Morozovsk (Russian: Моро́зовск) is a town and the administrative center of Morozovsky District in Rostov Oblast
column3: located on the Bystraya River (left tributary of the Seversky Donets)
column5: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 27

column1: The khutor of Morozov (Моро́зов) was founded in the 1880s. In 1900
column5: the stanitsa of Taubeyevskaya (Таубе́евская) was established near the railway station. It was renamed Morozovskaya on April 24
column7: these two rural localities grew and merged
column8: and the resulting settlement was granted town status in 1941.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Morozovsk serves as the administrative center of Morozovsky District. As an administrative division
column3: it is incorporated within Morozovsky District as Morozovskoye Urban Settlement. As a municipal division
column4: this administrative unit also has urban settlement status and is a part of Morozovsky Municipal District.

column1: There is an airbase located 3.1 miles (5.0 km) southwest of the town.
There are many monuments and museums In Morozovsk.

Near the train station is a monument to the steam Locomotive.Morozov Museum was opened in 1994. The Museum building was built in the early twentieth century on the outskirts of the former farm Lyubimov. The facade of the Museum there are four bas-relief. On two bas-reliefs shows a smithy with two blacksmiths
column4: on the other — Cossack on horseback with  guns.Monument to the fallen soldiers of the Soviet army who died during the great Patriotic war.A monument in honor of the Soviet victory over Nazi Germany — the MiG-21.The Church Of The Intercession Of The Blessed Virgin Mary.  The Church was built by the project Fomin
column5: Konstantin Ivanovich in 1914. The Church was consecrated on 25 April 1915. The Church operated until the mid 1930-ies. Was built next to a military town and the Church were in its territory. So the temple remained standing until the end of 1940-ies. During the war the temple was destroyed the bell tower. After the war the Church was a military warehouse. In 2001 began the restoration of the temple. In the temple are the icon of St. Nikolay Popov with relics
column6: the icon of Matrona of Moscow with a particle of the relics
column7: the icon of the Holy virgin.
